about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get To Know
about.description: I am a Web Applications Development student with experience in React, Java (Spring Boot), vanilla JavaScript, and MySQL. I have worked on creating APIs, admin panels, and I'm currently interested in developing an e-commerce website. I'm passionate about artificial intelligence and process automation, areas where I would like to continue growing professionally.

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.description: I build responsive and dynamic web applications using modern technologies.

automation.title: Process Automation with AI
automation.description: I automate repetitive tasks using AI tools to improve efficiency and productivity.
details: Focus on repetitive or manual workflows
Exploring integrations with popular AI platforms

projects.title: Figma dashboard UI kit for data design web apps

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.review: Working with Alex has been an absolute pleasure. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are exceptional. He not only delivered our project on time but also provided valuable insights that improved our product significantly. His expertise in React and Java made him an invaluable asset to our team.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.review: Alex's ability to understand complex requirements and translate them into elegant solutions is remarkable. His work on our e-commerce platform was outstanding, implementing features that significantly improved our conversion rates. His dedication to clean code and best practices made the project maintainable and scalable.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.review: What impressed me most about Alex was his ability to handle both frontend and backend development with equal expertise. His implementation of our AI automation system saved us countless hours of manual work. His technical knowledge combined with his strong communication skills makes him an excellent developer to work with.
